website_summaries.verdict: For cats who can be pilled easily, Capstar is an effective and affordable alternative to topical medications.
pros: Fast acting formula, starts killing fleas in 30 minutes
Not a messy or smelly topical formula
Can be administered once a day for major infestations
cons: Pill form is challenging to administer to some cats
Flea-killing effects are only temporary, should be combined with other meds

customer_reviews.title: Yesterday this product killed our beloved cat Tyto
customer_reviews.text: We gave this product to our four cats who all have fleas suddenly. One of the cats had a mild reaction with panting and heavy breathing. But a second cat, Tyto, went into anaphylaxis and was gone in route to the emergency vet. There is no warning at all about this. Tyto is now gone and our family is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great flea killer
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing - however I forgot how hard it is to give a cat a pill I swear I’ve barely got the pill in their mouth and it seemed like the fleas began dropping
customer_reviews.author: Cathe Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Works miracles!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been out and in of the house, because it’s summertime and we let them out at times... but this one time they got infested by fleas and we tried so many different things that were just not working for them. We crushed these pills and put them all over their wet food, fed them, let them out in the back yard so the fleas won’t fall inside the house, and an hour or so later we showered them and there were no sign that they ever had fleas! Definitely using this product if this ever happens again! I recommend it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: J Riv

customer_reviews.title: Your Kitty will be happy
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before buying this product. Being near a beach, my indoor kitty got out for a wander and came back with fleas. They were nasty and attacking people too. This product works within 10 minutes. You still must vac your home and then get a few flea bombs/ Vet-Kem foggers are great and Alpine is what the professionals use as foggers. So be diligent and do it all. You have to keep after those nasty fleas, but they will soon be goners. Also be sure to get your kitty on Advantage or Frontline. This Pill is not a long term remedy for your cat but it will kill what is presently on your cat. DO THE FOLLOW-UP.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’m a veterinarian technician and I’ve worked with capstar in the past and it worked great and fast.. I had gotten 2 new additions to our family, and of coarse they have fleas 😤😫, so I had purchased this product and placed advantage 2 on EVERY animal as well as treating my house... I kept a close eye on each animal to see if anything happened and found there was absolutely no change... I gave an additional dose 24 hours later and still no change.. I don’t know what they changed about the formula but I recommend that you DO NOT WASTE UR 💵
customer_reviews.author: Steph D.

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKED!
customer_reviews.text: Worked on all my cats including my 4 month old kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: It killed my cat
customer_reviews.text: I had given my cat 3 doses two weeks apart after third dose my cat died I would not recommend this to anyone my cat was almost two years old and we gave him the recommend doses on the package
customer_reviews.author: Grogg / Larson Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I crushed it up added it to wet food and it was eaten up as usual. I read some of the negative reviews and I don’t believe the tablets caused the problems. My cat is 14 years old very healthy. She won’t wear a collar or get drops so this is used now and then will I vacuum and clean carpets. I highly recommend these tablets
customer_reviews.author: Queen Ruth

customer_reviews.title: This is a pill
customer_reviews.text: If you read about this, it is not that easy to administer and has been harmful if you read the reviews. I chose not to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: My cat is dying because of this product
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 pill to my cat and 1 hr later my car has lots of side effects like not being able to walk or eat anything. It won’t react anytime that we call her name. This product never state anywhere about any side effects I really which they had said something about because I would not purchase it for sure. Be aware of this my cat is dying 😩😡
customer_reviews.author: ANNYDLA

customer_reviews.title: Acts fast, but made cat go a little nuts
customer_reviews.text: Its only been 20 minutes and its already working. My Autumn is going a little crazy at the moment. See video. I think its because it is working. I just hid the pill in her food, first feed of the day so she would be hungry, but she ate around it. So I ended up having to roll it in the soft food "juice" and had to pop it into the back of her mouth. She did fight a little but then it went down easily. Now we wait. I can tell it is working though. Ready for my baby to have some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: my cats are now all shaking uncontrollably. They never did this before giving them this product. Just be cautious. Its difficult to feed cats pills, but once they do eat it, the fleas began dropping in about 30 minutes. I was extremely sceptical on if it would work but I'm so glad I purchased this product. I reccomended this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought it the medicine worked perfectly. Now this time I got it the medicine made my cat start losing hair & itching really badly. Within 24 hours he had this huge spot on him from itching so crazy. Also the package came all ripped up & open.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Lett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fleas be GONE! Cheaper than a visit to the vet and super effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work...
customer_reviews.text: First pill was difficult to administer, I finally had to pry cat's mouth open and massage throat to swallow. Second pill I crushed into wet food. Neither worked and second pill made cat throw up. I had high hopes for the product which did not happen. Product returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dale G. Shields

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed this DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on my outdoor cat and it did NOTHING to the fleas OR my cat!! With all the POSITIVE reviews, I thought I’d try it. I’m very frustrated because I thought “this is the one” to help my cats’ flea problems. I’m tired of spending money on every single flea treatment under the sun!! Any suggestions out there? I’m desperate.....
customer_reviews.author: horseydidi

customer_reviews.title: Causes sores!! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give this credit. It killed some fleas. It also caused horrible sores on both of our cats. I followed instructions and dosage directions. We are a few days past treatment and the fleas are worse than before. I am a mess. I don’t know what to do. Do I have to wait before I spend MORE money on something else?? I don’t want my cats any sicker than they already are from this medication.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Rundall

customer_reviews.title: 30 Minutes Indeed
customer_reviews.text: Opened the cat's mouth, dropped the pill. In 30 minutes one cat was uncomfortable and grooming restlessly as the fleas were searching for better spots I suppose. Then the calm came. Truly a competition for the other brands that rip of customers with their 30-day clocks and at a substantially great price.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMamaNow

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff probably worked on getting rid of the fleas, but 2 of my cats had a reaction to it. They both started running around knocking stuff over. They kept scratching, and licking as if something was on them, and they couldn't get it off. One started panting like a dog, and her heart looked to be beating really fast. Took a couple hours for her to calm down. I will not be giving any of my cats this stuff again.
customer_reviews.author: hollow_ex

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not work!!! I bought it for my three cats and my three dogs. They weren't covered in fleas but they all had a few. A week after I have them the pills they still had fleas. I don't think they pills affected them at all!!! Very frustrating because I feel like I just wasted $150.00!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive a first, but my two kittens were clearly very uncomfortable ... THis product is extremely impressive!!! My kittens both reacted differently to the pill. One was annoyed by the reaction and cried out a little while the fleas became stirred up, I immediately bathed them both... Within 30 min the fleas started to jump off of and out of my kittens bodies NO JOKE! Happy babies. Works for about 3-4 days 1/2 dose to my irritated kitty this time... I’m a furever satisfied customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Caused cats to go crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused both of my cats to pant with heavy breathing and elevated temperatures. Both cats started running around the house knocking things over and acting crazy for approximately 30 mins. It took them about a day to finally recover and return back to their normal selves. The flee problem did not get better. This product did not work for our cats and I will never give them these pills again.
customer_reviews.author: "ssullivan@stellartec.com"

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting
customer_reviews.text: We learned about this product from our vet. She used this product for our cats when they were kittens. I have a white cat so It is very easy to watch the fleas fall off him as they die! I know this product works and feel safe about using. I’ve never had anything negative to say. Works every time! They love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Do not play!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work if you’ve seen more than one flea. Is it easy to use? Have you ever met a cat? Should come with a pill shooter because anyone who has fleas has also tried bathing said cat and strapped them with flea collars. They are done with our garbage and then we have to wrestle them to gag them with our finger. It’s like playing a game on Saw. Will I lose a finger or no? Idk get a seresto collars and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it does
customer_reviews.text: Fast acting. Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Fleas are such a pain this time of year, and although our kitties are indoor kitties - fleas and flea eggs can travel on their humans. So on top of daily vacuuming, this is a great preventative and maintainer. I give it to my cats two to three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It was k
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my cats did well all tho they didnt like the smell of it smells like mosquito spray. But one of them got an alergic reaction.hes neck swole up alot and it was really Scarry. he was breathing normal but his sking was red . I gave him benadrill and the swolen whent down but took 2 day
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: 5000 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: WHY did I recently just find out about these? these work and work FAST. It's absolutely amazing. My youngest cat gets reactions from topicals, and neither cat will put up with wearing a collar. I've bombed my home, vacuum 2x a day anc comb my cats constantly. THIS WORKS. within minutes, literally. Your cats will start grooming and squirming because it agitates the fleas and they're trying to get away. By then it's too late for them!! OMG THIS IS A MIRACLE. My smaller cat gets bad skin conditions from fleas and im trying to be able to let her heal. This works. It works and it's CHEAP compared to other flea medications. I won't ever be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works, omg. My poor indoor cats somehow gor fleas. It was so bad. After using this, and again the following morning they were no longer super scratchy. Its amazing. I could see all the stuff just dying off, and it works for 24 hours which helps give the flea drops time to kick in and finish the job. Im so happy with this product. Id reccomend it to anyone whose cats got fleas.v
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Cat is thrilled with this...
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for the cat. Very pleased. Crushed into a small can of cat food and fed her. Easy and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer - Shelley

customer_reviews.title: It actually works. Will most likely purchase this again if needed
customer_reviews.text: The kittens were infested with fleas. This is what happened after 30 minutes. They literally started falling off. I broke up two pills and mixed it into a plate of dry cat food with water. The plate of food was divided between 4 (older) kittens and the mama cat. To clarify, only two pills out of the box were used to treat 5 cats. This was the result of way less than the recommended dosage. They all started itching at the same time and each time they got up they had a pile of fleas underneath. They went from being infested to having no fleas when i checked 3 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Tenant

customer_reviews.title: Answered Prayers!
customer_reviews.text: We tried the drops and then a flea collar that was absolute garbage with no luck. Decided to try this product and it worked like a charm. Gave my cat one pill in some wet food and combed him an hour later. Already had half as many fleas as before and a few popped off dying. Next day after work I spot combed him and only came up with 2 dead fleas. He's been acting more like himself and is no longer obsessively grooming! Now I just need to get them out of the rest of the house and I'll be good to go! So thankful for this product!!
customer_reviews.author: SweetNuss

customer_reviews.title: Don't use !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought I could use it to get rid of every thing my cat might have because she wouldn't stop scratching. Not even 20 minutes later and my cat couldn't stand up and wobbling all over the place. I washed it off asap but she didn't act right for a few days, it really scared me.
customer_reviews.author: weather bug

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my cat thinking it would work but of course it didn't. My cat went crazy running all over the house she was leaving spots of blood on the floor panting horribly drooling heart rate elevated. I would not recommend this product at all, I was scared to death my cat was having a bad adverse reaction and needed to go to the vet or would die. I have given my cat confortis and it did not have the effects as horrible as this product.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Throw the pill at fleas and you will have a better chance at killing them
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money Was worried about cats health with this med but since it couldn’t even kill a flea I’m not too worried about cat
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: WOW, IT REALLY DOES WORK THAT FAST!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how within min the fleas started falling off all 4 of our cats. What I did not expect was how much they'd b freaking out. After few hours, started calming down & then i saw almost dead fleas & tiny blood spots everywhere. We have been faithfully using Advocate (generic version of advantage multi) 4 a few years now. It hadn't phased these "Super-fleas" at all. I also want 2 mention that i started them on half dose & got these amazing results! 😻 They are all resting peacefully now w/some catnip 2 make up 4 the "trippin' out" they went through. Highly recommended this!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Capstar when our three indoor cats caught some fleas. I crushed up the pill and mixed it with their wet food and they couldn't tell that anything was in there. At the time, we were combing our cats twice a day, once in the morning and once in the evening. After giving them Capstar in the morning, their evening combing was a drastic change. I was impressed at how quickly Capstar worked and did not cause any side effects to our cats. Capstar is not a permanent solution as we still apply flea medication.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wow,it’s Magic
customer_reviews.text: This was MAGIC, we have 3 pets and had fleas all over. I tried this product last night, thinking this is just another waste of money and time, but I couldn’t believe my eyes. My smallest cat stated to lick like crazy in about an hour and I saw fleas falling of him. My wife a non believer of any flea products since she spent so much money with no results, could not believe that this morning ALL our pets fleas have gone from their fur. She asked me what MAGIC product did I buy. I told her that I bought it on AMAZON! She now told all friends and family with the similar issues. To be continue.......
customer_reviews.author: carlos franco

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Did nothing for my kitten that came to us with fleas. I sprayed the house and vacuumed. Shevstill had fleas on her. I had to order some Vets Best spray which actually seems to be working. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: charrow

customer_reviews.title: Works great but use in the morning
customer_reviews.text: This is seems like a "magic" little pill! It is absolutely amazing how fast it took effect and you could watch the fleas just coming off my cat. I had no idea they were as bad as they were. I just wish I had read some of the reviews about the cats freaking out. Mine freaked out alright. I wouldn't advise giving this pill in the evening cuz he had us up all night long. Running around crazy & making crazy crying howling noises. It was awful. I would definitely treat him again if we needed to but during the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoal00

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Capstar is amazing! I purchased this after seeing a few fleas on me and noticing my cats scratching themselves. I gave the small pill to my cat (that was fun) and about 30 minutes later he decided to sit on my lap. A few minutes after he left I looked down and saw literally dozens of lifeless or half dead fleas on my lap. Within 30 minutes! They were so far gone they didn't even try to get away. It's a gross picture I uploaded, but dang it's effective! No negative effects on my kitties.
customer_reviews.author: My Living Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Using Capstar
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Capstar for my cats for over 10 years, off and on depending on the flea problem. The pills have always worked great. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the pills didn't work as well this time as they have before. No idea why. However, the second time it used this batch the problem went away. Gave them the pills, waited fro them to take effect and then gave the cats (3) a bath in Dawn. No more flea problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been continually using frontline and advantage that do not work. I decided to try Capstar after reading all the reviews but was skeptical. I put the tablet in a pill pocket treat since my cats are picky eaters and they all took them with no problems. After the cats took the pill they acted like they were super itchy for about 30 minutes but then I saw the fleas just dropping off them. I saw the dead fleas all over my floor! Amazing product, I just wish it would last longer than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Crushed it up into his wet food and the fleas flew off! He was very itchy for a few hours while the medicine was working but afterwards he was so much more relaxed and cuddly again. Gave it to him about 3 days ago and there are no signs of fleas as of now after some vacuuming, we’ll see how it does! I was worried he might be allergic as a couple of reviews stated but there didn’t seem to be any problems.
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Good boost to flea treatment but not useful on its own.
customer_reviews.text: Product works for 1 day only (as advertized). Killing adult fleas only with no effect on eggs and larvae. Must be combined with other products to have any lasting effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my four cats. Didn't work. I've been reading that fleas have evolved; the few fleas that survive the flea meds breed new generations that tend to also have the same resistance to the neurotoxins. Intend to see if prescription flea meds will work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: A Superior Product to Kill Fleas on Cats
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Capstar for my 12 lb male Siamese for over year after disappointing results with collars and chemical products like Advantage II which take up to a week to work. In my opinion Capstar is a superior product...fleas either die or abandon ship within the first hour and they stay away for about 30 days. My cat tolerates Capstar well and one cannot beat the time to become effective. Price is competitive with Advantage II. One suggestion...give your cat a Capstar pill in the morning and put him outside immediately. One does not want dead or dying fleas in your beading, furniture, or carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Dawon

customer_reviews.title: Fred has yet to recover
customer_reviews.text: Well, I gave him the one pill, no problem. A bit later he started jumping and running as the fleas died or bailed. He became calmer as the evening wore on, then the next day he just laid around all day, never did eat. Today the same, no food and no activity.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bartle

customer_reviews.title: It only works for 24 hours. Needs additional products to keep fleas away.
customer_reviews.text: 4 cats costing a fortune in ADVANTAGE, and fleas STILL jumping around on the spot where we apply it. This pill killed ALL fleas in 24 hours. We also sprayed all carpet, sofas, beds, chairs with a Vets Best room spray. After 24 hours we applied ADAMS flea spray to the cats fur, really soaking them. 1 week later, cats are still flea free, although we found some hopping around on the hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Botha

customer_reviews.title: Not exceptional
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult to get out of the package without it braking into parts. It was therefore doubly difficult to administer. After that I went to pains to get them out in one piece, and have to say it was difficult to administer. The product seems expensive to me, mainly because it only seems to reduce the number of adult fleas not get rid of them. She scratched less but still scratched. Best results came from giving it every 3 days (based on research I did on the flea life cycle). If this helps, please tap on the helpful icon below
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Reduced fleas but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say it got rid of all the fleas but it greatly reduced them. A bit expensive though. I’d order more and make this a regular treatment for my cat but the price kinda puts me off. $30 for 6 pills that only kill most of the adult fleas and don’t even touch the eggs is a bit steep. It’s good if you need a stepping stone for a really bad infestation though.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: My Luna Putuna is now happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe my baby had fleas!! They were eating me and my kids alive 2! As soon as I gave her Capstar!! WOW!! Second day and she is super calm and flea free!!
customer_reviews.author: Ambar Suarez

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LUCK TRYING TO GET A CAT TO EAT A PILL!
customer_reviews.text: I basically wasted my money using the entire pack of pills/tablets trying to get my stubborn cat to ingest it! The second time I even tried crushing up the pill and he did end up eating it mixed with the friskies PATTE style canned food then waited a few Days STILL HAS FLEAS! Tried again today hiding the pill inside a piece of meat because I don’t think crushing it like before was effective (as it did not work at all) he totally SKIPPED over the yellow tablet once again!! Not happy that I wasted money and time!! DONT GET FOR YOUR CAT!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Harris

customer_reviews.title: They seemed to help for an immediate need.
customer_reviews.text: My cat became resistant to his flea medication. I called the vet after a recent application did not relieve his irritation. Since my flea meds had heartworm meds in them as well, I was told to wait 3 weeks before using my new prescription. The vet suggested this. My cat had visible signs of flea irritation and this helped. It only lasts for 24 hours and you need to redose. I did not see complete relief in that time, but It was better than nothing while I waiting to dose him with the new flea/heartworm prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa M.

customer_reviews.title: 2 doses and did NOT kill the fleas. Just made them jump around alot...
customer_reviews.text: Well. We are on our second dose now and it's not doing anything but making the fleas come to the surface of the hair and crawl right back inside. It's not killing them AT ALL. Maybe they weakened the formula die to cats dieing? I was weary of trying after hearing that, but my cats have NONE of the negative symptoms described and NONE of the rapid flea die off either. Not worth the risk for something that isn't even effective...
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: First-it’s hard enough to give a cat a pill, and we had to give this to 6 cats. Second-we did notice dead fleas, which was great! But third-it didn’t kill all the fleas and now they all have fleas again even though we treated carpets and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CThom3431

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works Miracles
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of fighting a flea infestation that came from our rescue kitty we finally got rid of them after two pills. We tried every spray, bomb and flea bath in addition to constant vacuuming and laundering. Nothing worked but this. I just crushed up the pills and added to wet food and within a few days we were finally flea free. I wish I’d known about this sooner so I could have saved myself all kinds of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and I always have these on hand as the kittens I get are usually found from outdoors and loaded with fleas. I do a dawn bath and this medication if they are 2lbs. This stuff has been amazing and works so quickly. Ive seen some reactions to some of the kittens getting restless from it but thankfully only lasted about 30 minutes and they calmed down. I wouldnt repeat it with those kittens. Once they get this I then also apply the monthly flea meds this just helps kick start getting rid of the fleas. Its really worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roach

customer_reviews.title: My cat is sick from this and my dog from the dog CS!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! My cat is 😷 sick as well as my poor dog now from these two products good going! Are these knock offs? My dog has a vet appointment in the am thank you! Who would wangle you hurt their animal?
customer_reviews.author: Sharone

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make my cat take, but worth it when I did!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to make my cat eat the pill so I had to make him swallow it and man did I feel so guilty. Definitely made up for it later when he stopped itching completely. I never have seen him more relaxed the past few days! Hes finally not itching like crazy :) the price is actually reasonable for the quality and amount you get although it was hard for me to come up with that kind of money. Maybe they can make one that smells and is flavored like a cat treat. That would make it much easier than me putting it in my cats mouth and forcing it down with water.
customer_reviews.author: Rhokaya

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective for cats and kittens
customer_reviews.text: These tablets really work. I have used them on my cat for a week now and no sign of an fleas and i have sprayed my house with the Alpine spray. The fleas are bad this year and I have an indoor cat. Make sure you brush yourself off after going out in the grass or gardens and don't wear the same shoes you where outside that you wear inside. The fleas will stay on you for the ride into your house. I give my cat small treats and then I give him the tablet no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought based on reviews
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Capstar Fast-Acting Oral Flea Treatment for Cats based on the mostly positive reviews, but after one dose, it did nothing for the fleas on our cat. It was a pain to shove the pill down her throat - thank goodness the pill was small. After reading other reviews, am now scared to give another pill. We are going back to the topical treatments.
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: HEALTHY HAPPY KITTY!
customer_reviews.text: My cat just hit his 3 year birthday. With that came his de-worming. I saw a worm in his stool and the only explanation was fleas he gets from our dogs who romp in the dog park with other dogs. A cat can get worms from ingesting fleas. So I bought this. By night he was flea less. Today 6/7 I found some adult fleas on him and gave him a second dose. No problem at all. I will buy this again every so often. It took about a month to see another flea on him. But I know that by tmmrw morning they'll be dead and gone.
customer_reviews.author: LISSIE TERAN

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: I did have to give my cats a couple rounds of this, but our apartment unfortunately had a really badly problem so even when we got the fleas off the cats there were some that probly were lingering in the carpets. Cheaper than options from my vet amd worked better actually! Will be buying I'm the future again. Both my cats are rescues and have their own health issues, so of course I was a little weary to try something not directly from a vet Tech, but I am now very comfortable with this product and it had no bed side effects with either of my cats, and even worked on my cat that has FIV
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Banister

customer_reviews.title: Works very well & does just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The pills are easy to crush & mix into wet food. I found it very easy to get my cats to swallow them whole as well. I've given it to my 4 cats 3 times over the summer. The fleas get very aggressive & bite which made my poor kitties go a little crazy for an hour or so but then they were flea free. I also use Frontline to keep them at bay but we have had a very difficult summer. Their brother (a dog) keeps bringing fleas home after a walk. The Cap Star for dogs is really good too but here in Tennessee this summer the fleas & ticks have been really bad.
customer_reviews.author: celeste monkeypjs

customer_reviews.title: Only a 24 Hour Treatment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying this did work—some. The fleas went into their hyper activity phase and my poor kitten went absolutely bonkers for awhile scratching and biting at the dying fleas. But even after all of the daily treatments we’re still dealing with fleas. I should’ve read the fine print that says the medication only lasts 24 hours and spent the extra couple of dollars for a topical treatment that lasts for a few WEEKS. Between trying to force feed my kitten a pill, fleas flying all over the place, having to hunt down information on this treatments potency, and the overall fail to annihilate these fleas, I give this a 3 star at best.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Help for Flea Infestation
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff. Our apartment and cats were infested by fleas when I brought some boxes into our apartment. The fleas were so bad that we were finding them on our feet and legs. Nothing worked until I treated our cats with Capstar. After two treatments at two week intervals, all the fleas on cats and on us were gone. I don't really understand how the pills worked so well, but they did.
customer_reviews.author: S. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Crushed a pill for each cat in some broth, with the narrow end of a wooden spoon in a bowl. Mixed with some tuna fish for each cat and they ate it up. After a half hour one of the cats was scratching a lot, then they all slept. Saw a dead flea later. Now going to put on a topspot treatment for long term treatment.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our cat. Based on the reviews, I thought it was a good product. But, it was not effective on my cat. First dose seemed as if there were good results. I did not see fleas for a few weeks and she stopped scratching. But, she started scratching 2 weeks after taking it. I then was seeing more and more fleas so I have her another dose at 3 weeks instead of waiting a Full month. The second dose was less effective.... starting scratching within 2 weeks of the second dose. I am afraid to give her a third dose within 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: E. St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other products
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well for us. I had previously used a different brand with the same active ingredient (Sentry Capguard), which worked well for my cat with only one dose. This year I switched to this product, Capstar and my cat still has fleas after 2 doses. Thankfully she did not have any adverse reactions, but I will not be using this product again.
customer_reviews.author: moodina

customer_reviews.title: Falling one by one.
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazing for my cat, I'm writing this review after the first dose, and the fleas started falling off my kitty, or rising to the top of her coat and spazzing out until they died. After about 15 minutes she started licking everywhere the fleas were, and I think it's because they started to run around all over her causing her to scratch or lick. I'm very satisfied with the outcome after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven carroll

customer_reviews.title: Effective flea control when used along with a monthly topical flea treaty
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than purchasing from our local vet. However I would say it was only about 70% effective in eliminating all live fleas within the 6 hours ( claims to be 90% effective) Had to use 3 doses to eliminate all live fleas . Then I repeated weekly for 3 weeks in conjunction with a monthly topical flea treatment to control any eggs that hatched or fleas brought in from outside . Still would recommend as it might have not been as effective as they claim but still works better and is less traumatic then giving our cats flea baths .
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: works really well
customer_reviews.text: works really well, no complaints. except for the price, just a bit high for me, i wish they were sold for cheaper in higher quantities. these pills are the only thing that will kill these disgusting things. one of my cats was getting seizures and peeing all over himself due to fleas (or maybe the other products i tried to get rid of them).
customer_reviews.author: oitoy

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: So I’m giving this 4 stars because I’ve now given my cats two doses of this. I noticed a lot of dead fleas, but they are still scratching. Figured two doses would be okay since they are inside only. I’m assuming it’s not long lasting and just kills off the adults. I’m looking for something that will kill adults, eggs and will kill them if they are bitten. I used confortis for so long looks like I’ll be going back to that!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: No Flea Lives Matter.
customer_reviews.text: After buying 9 different flea collars, for 3 cats, I said screw this & I bought these pills & 6 bombs from home depot. Locked myself & 3 cats in the garage, bombed all 3 stories of my home & before any of them could go back inside, they had to eat their cleverly disguised flea pill, smashed up in their dinner. Hopefully, this is the end of the fleas. And I'm wondering, if God made everything for a reason, what are the reason for fleas? Hmm? What good do they do? What is beneficial about them? Nothing. Kill them.
customer_reviews.author: 408chaos

customer_reviews.title: Worked on one cat, not so much on other.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed one of my cats had a bug on her and it turned out to be fleas! Wanted some a quick remedy that’ll help slow down and stop infestation. The pill is small and bought a meat pill pocket so she and my other cat can eat it without fuss. After waiting 30 minutes, i took them a bath with dawn. My boy had a couple dead ones after taking this possibly. My girl had a few that were still alive.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: It's like Custer's Last Stand for fleas
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I gave my cat a tablet when I got home from work this evening. In about half an hour, fleas were literally falling off of her. At first I started vacuuming up their carcasses but then I found a lint roller to be more useful. This stuff really works. I knew my cat had fleas but I had no idea the infestation was this bad. She was scratching a lot, and I found them on me occasionally, which led me to look for a treatment. I would definitely recommend this stuff as it works and it works fast!
customer_reviews.author: WRS67

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not a good investment
customer_reviews.text: I just finished the entire bottle a few weeks ago. I just don’t understand the high price or the lack of nutritional information with this product. Dr Berg does all these you tube videos, going over every detail...but you literally cannot get additional information about the product. Since supplements are not regulated by the FDA...I’m afraid it’s literally a matter of results for which there are none. I saw no weight loss, increased metabolism or energy, and thyroid blood test was negative for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: ceb

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT give to older cats!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old cat had a grand mal seizure after taking this medication, and it didn't even kill any of the fleas. It was the scariest thing I've ever seen and I thought she was dying. Luckily she survived, but she now has long lasting problems and I'm starting to worry she won't be with us much longer. I'm seeing this on reviews for every flea treatment for cats now.. just comb them thoroughly every day and use a small amount of tea tree oil dilluted with water combed through their fur to discourage fleas. I know it's such an awful problem, but these meds are pretty likely to kill your cat. So just don't. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Karan W.

customer_reviews.title: na
customer_reviews.text: the product burned and blistered my cats neck. will not use the product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Tried Frontline multiple times, vacuuming everyday, carpet sprays, DE & this worked!! Actually split pills in half and tossed it in back of their throat until they swallowed. Four cats and worked wonderfully on every one of them! I plan to to do it again in a couple days just to make sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shika

customer_reviews.title: Works right away!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 stray cats and they wont even let me touch them. They scratch 24-7. Feeding them is the only interaction that I have with them. I put this small pill in a food bowls yesterday wrapped in a small piece of a hot dog wiener. He ate it right up without spitting it out. He showed up this morning and did his regular routine and never scratched once!!! wooooohooooo I'm still waiting on the female stray cat to show up to doctor her. This works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a maintenance pill but it's not We gave the cat 3 flea baths in one day used raid bagged up anything that was a cloth or fabric and used life vac car vacuum as well as the regular vacumn and then each time let the cats go back on the furniture so the fleas would hop back on and by the end of the day there were no more fleas or eggs. Btw if you have a closet with a tracking system like for a glass shower the fleas love to hide in there. Sucked up 8 fleas from that one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results, I have been using seresto flea collars and we still get an occasional infestation here in the sandbox of Florida. These pills took care of this instantly. Rub a little tuna fish on them and the cats devour them. No trouble getting them to take it. Within a day they are sleeping soundly and we have zero scratching! Zero side effects happened with my cats. These are two very healthy originally Farrell, well adapted for indoors creatures, not inbred 8 toed cats.
customer_reviews.author: bigjim

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, but only for ~1/2 the time
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described, 30min after giving to my kitten I can comb off dead fleas. Of note, around that time I do see increased itching from my cat, but a brief google search states that it is normal as the dying fleas move to the surface. I have found that if used alone (was using it while waiting on other flea products) it doesn’t seem to last a full 24 hours, more like 12. But two rounds of two different topicals (one given by foster group adopted him from:revolution, and one administered by me:advantageII) did nothing. This was an excellent stop gap in between obtaining and receiving comfortis which I also highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten staff

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this product works quickly and it's more affordable than most flea and tick products. My cats are healthier, their fur and skin looks better, they're more comfortable, happier and they stop itching 24 hours after I give them this oral flea product. They've never had a problem from Capstar, ZERO side effects!! I have used this on my cats several times and I love this due to the fact that I'm so afraid of other products. This is my go to for quick acting and safe flea and tick relief for my furry friends! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes. Miracle flee stuff
customer_reviews.text: Listen if no one told you about capstar I am. Capstar is all you need and You do not have to buy it from the vet and you do not need a prescription. My vet sold it to me at $30 a pill. Oh I should say OLD vet. Thats Highway robbery. 3 days of capstar once a day in the morning and a topical on day 4. And your good to go. For my cat it lasts months. Not just one and shes indoor outdoor thanks Amazon for making capstar available.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY LOVESamazon

customer_reviews.title: This Still Works Pretty Well For Our Cats
customer_reviews.text: Capstar for Cats doesn't seem to kill quite as many fleas as it used to, but this is still pretty effective for what it's supposed to do. I would suggest getting enough for a second and maybe a third round (read directions for how much time minimum to leave in between) to help get even better control over the flea population when only the fleas are doing absolutely fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for giving it to cats who are skiddish
customer_reviews.text: A cat who visits us for meals and snacks for several months started having patches of hair missing in the summer. He’s super skiddish so this was the best way to try and administer some flea treatment. The last topical jingle I gave home, he didn’t even stick around for me to finish squeezing out the dose. This was perfect! crushed the pill and sprinkled it on his breakfast and Temptation treats. And he started doing much better within a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Best flea treatment
customer_reviews.text: We have used capstar twice now and no issues for 48 hours. This summer the fleas got bad, we have 4 cats and 2 dogs. We did a flea treatment in our house and all the animals and this works great to help get those fleas under control.
customer_reviews.author: Donto & Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My 21 year old cat had horrible fleas. She was bleeding from the continual scratching and had stopped eating. I tried giving her it 4 times, each time she spat it out. But, just from being in her mouth 4 times, the fleas started dying in about 30 minutes and died all day. I was amazed. She only weighs about 4 pounds. So little dissolved off of the pill, it looked like it was almost new. It is potent! She eats and can move around fairly quickly again.
customer_reviews.author: rae ann anderson

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for my Bengal
customer_reviews.text: My cat has flea dermatitis, and the ointment that you apply apparently burns his skin, because he would literally growl while hiding under coffee table, miserable. He’s a Bengal Cat and very stubborn, yet extremely smart. I have to squirt all liquid medication in his food. I figured I would have to visit the vet every month (also not his thing) for prednisone shots until I saw they actually made a tiny pill that I would wrap in cheese, and he didn’t mind it a bit. I could also tell after a few hours he felt better and the itching and scratching stopped. His fur is coming back in beautifully. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at How Well This Worked
customer_reviews.text: 0% of me believed that this was going to work. I tried everything over the counter at my local store to get rid of the fleas eating my cat alive , to no avail. After 2 doses, my cat was completely flea free. Completely. The first day looked like it was torturing him as he struggled to get all of the dead fleas off of him. We combed aggressively. We’re continuing to comb to try to get the eggs off, but a week later he’s still flea free. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally oral med!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is right, it's for the adult fleas not the eggs but I was happy to finally fond an oral medication. I don't mind repeating the process with combination of flea bath. I just wish there were more than 6 to the packing. Could improve in that manner. 🐱 are more sensitive than 🐕 so you can't have too strong of medication in their system.
customer_reviews.author: The truth be told

customer_reviews.title: Best there is!
customer_reviews.text: I could not say anything bad about this!! Best flea product there is!! My only wish is that it would be liquid since my cats won’t eat the pill I have to smash it and make a paste with water and shove it in their mouths with a medicine dropper lol
customer_reviews.author: Halley

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay
customer_reviews.text: First dose lasted about three weeks, second about two. Third didn't even last two. This product is good for a spot flea issue, but I recommend going to your vet if you have a major infestation (our complex had to deal with a giant flea problem, this year.)
customer_reviews.author: L. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Flea Free!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had fleas & there were fleas all in our home! We gave her this pill & the fleas have been gone from her. This pill is very small so she can swallow it with ease! If you have fleas, I would suggest this pill along with Borax & a flea collar to tackle them at all stages & places!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solved the problem when advantage topical treatment didn’t
customer_reviews.text: My two cats had fleas for weeks, and none of the topical treatments I tried seemed to help. I wasted over $60 on advantage and other non-prescription brand topical solutions. I ended up using 3x the normal amount on each cat over the course of just a few weeks, while the labels claimed just one dose would protect/treat for 30 days. This pill took care of their fleas in a day or two! And they haven’t had problems since. I’ll use this next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my two indoor/outdoor cats and it seemed to work great. The fleas dieing from the nuerotoxin made my cats act strangely for an hour or so but then I noticed dead fleas on the ground near where they had finally calmed down and napped. Unfortunately I let my cats outside again a few days later and the fleas returned, so I gave them a second dose and have kept the cats in since and have had no new fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Eby

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but the directions did confuse me. Not sure how long this pill is suppose to actually work. Says you can give pills as often as needed, even daily?? I have given my cat 2 now in a span of a week. Fleas seem to be gone, but do I need to keep giving to her???
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly, use with a vet approved topical
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Kills fast. Use with topical from your vet for longer lasting protection. I think it is funny that they are asking "ease of use" on this review. You are giving a pill to a cat... never easy... but not a reflection of the product but the pet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dean

product_meta.title: Capstar Fast-Acting Oral Flea Treatment for Cats, 6 Doses, 11.4 mg (2-25 lbs)
product_meta.description:
Product Description 
Capstar (nitenpyram) is a fast-acting flea treatment tablet for use in dogs and cats that starts killing fleas in only 30 minutes. A single dose of Capstar kills 90% of adult fleas within 4 hours for dogs and 6 hours for cats, ridding your pet of these pesky parasites. Capstar is for dogs, puppies, cats, and kittens 2 pounds of body weight or greater and 4 weeks of age or older. 



Key Features 

 * One convenient tablet starts killing fleas within 30 minutes
 * Treat flea infestations fast for every cat and dog in your home*
 * Kills adult fleas before they can lay eggs and start an infestation
 * One tablet kills 90% of fleas in 4 hours for dogs and 6 hours for cats
 * Safe to administer one tablet per day until flea infestation is resolved
 * Capstar kills adult fleas that may cause flea allergy dermatitis.


*Capstar is for dogs, puppies, cats and kittens 2 pounds of body weight or greater and 4 weeks of age and older. 

Dosing 
Capstar is available in 2 dosages: * Cats and dogs from 2 to 25 pounds (11.4 mg) * Dogs from 25.1 - 125 pounds (57 mg) 

Administration 
To give Capstar tablets, place the oral tablet directly in your pet’s mouth or hide it in food. 

Use with Other Medications 
If your pet is currently receiving a monthly or longer-lasting flea preventative medication but still becomes infested with fleas, it is safe to administer Capstar to address a flea infestation. 

Capstar may also be used together with other products, including heartworm preventatives, corticosteroids, antibiotics, vaccines, deworming medications, and shampoos. 

Re-infestations 
Capstar kills adult fleas on dogs and cats, offering quick relief for your furry friend. While Capstar works fast to kill adult fleas and alleviate a current infestation, a subsequent preventative solution is recommended to prevent future re-infestations from any existing flea eggs and larvae in the environment. If you notice more fleas have found their way onto your dog or cat in the days following treatment, continue treating your dog or cat with Capstar with up to one dose per day. 

Important Safety Information 
Capstar is safe to use in puppies and kittens 4 weeks of age and older, and 2 pounds of body weight or greater. Always read, understand, and follow the label and use directions.
feature_bullets: One oral tablet starts killing fleas within 30 minutes of administration
Tackle flea infestations fast – give Capstar and watch dead fleas fall off your pet
The convenience of an oral tablet available without a prescription from your vet
If your pet gets re-infested with fleas, you can safely give another dose as often as once per day
Includes 6 doses for use with cats weighing 2-25 (11. 4 mg)
